item.title: MASS MEGAWATTS WIND POWER INC 10-K
item.description: MASS MEGAWATTS WIND POWER INC, which is in the Cogeneration Services & Small Power Producers [4991] industry, SEC 10-K filing on July 29, 2022 had 13270 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 206 instances solar - 140 instances wind - 137 instances power - 127 instances financial - 123 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
